assessmentId.description:
Unique identifier of the assessment to create the report from.

The following arguments are optional:

author.description: Name of the user who created the assessment report.

status.description: Current status of the specified assessment report. Valid values are `COMPLETE`, `IN_PROGRESS`, and `FAILED`.

assessmentId.description:
Unique identifier of the assessment to create the report from.

The following arguments are optional:

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering AssessmentReport resources.
